channel.title: [PI] A few things... [PI]
channel.description:
Hey Moparscapians,
I need a few things done with my server.
*A link to the original Demise click-stat-level *A way to get my ::item to be able to used by everyone *A way to make certain items unspawnable *A way to get my ::master to be able to used by everyone *When I trade the PK store it says, an item i added to it, costs 0 pk points, when it costs 14 *A way to add the Korasi to my client, so people can download the client and be able to see the Korasi *Make my PVP shop not run on actual pk points, but on Pk tickets(ecto tokens)
That's about it, you can add my msn: revealedx@live.com or just reply to this post. I have teamviewer, a VPS and anything else neccessary to complete the coding. Thanks for the help.

item.title: [PI] A few things... [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xx_extremez_xx xx extremez xx
item.description:
@xx_extremez_xx wrote:

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
/if (c.inWild() || isInPVP()) {
c.sendMessage(“No Item Spawning In Wildy/PVP.”);
} else {/
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 300000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] A few things... [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Hey Moparscapians,

 I need a few things done with my server.

*A link to the original Demise click-stat-level
*A way to get my ::item to be able to used by everyone
*A way to make certain items unspawnable
*A way to get my ::master to be able to used by everyone
*When I trade the PK store it says, an item i added to it, costs 0 pk points, when it costs 14
*A way to add the Korasi to my client, so people can download the client and be able to see the Korasi
*Make my PVP shop not run on actual pk points, but on Pk tickets(ecto tokens)

 That's about it, you can add my msn: revealedx@live.com or just reply to this post. I have teamviewer, a VPS and anything else neccessary to complete the coding. Thanks for the help.

Read full topic
